Validation:

Filter Integrity Test.

Pressure Balancing in corresponding rooms as per design conditions.

Temperature & RH Test.

Particle Count Test.
Maintenance:

Periodic Maintenance of Chiller and AHUs status 

Identifying and troubleshooting problems immediately to minimize production idle time and 
maintaining clean room conditions as per design.
